      • dot_pressed

        public static void dot_pressed​(Node node,
                               Dots dot)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method that handles the dots pressed by the player, verification and scores
        Parameters:
        node - the node that the player selected
        dot - the dot coordinates to draw line
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case that the Json conversion failed
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in case the client couldn't send the info
